page.title: 19Family Life
page.content: On Saturday I get up at 7:30a.m. and get washed and dressed.I go down for breakfast and watch T.V. until about 9:00 a.m. then I go out to play football a friend and I go to Bidlington or Scarborough about 1:30 p.m.We go shopping at Marks and Spencers and come home at about 5:00 p.m.I have tea,watch some more T.V. and go to play football or cricket.We come in about 8:00 p.m.,get washed and changed and go out with my mum and dad .We go to Scarborough sea front for an ice cream,have a walk to the nearest fish and chip shop and eat them in the car.About 9:45 p.m. we come home,have a drink,watch "Match of the Day" and go to bed
